com.google.code.jscep.util
Class HexUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.jscep.util.HexUtil

public final class HexUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides utilities for converting between byte arrays and hexadecimal strings.

Author:
David Grant
